title: Cover a Live Press Conference
description: A reporter is covering a live press conference with the mayor and needs to capture key quotes and ask a relevant question.

tasks.description: Before the event, research the topic of the press conference to prepare potential questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of 3-5 informed questions.

tasks.description: During the press conference, transcribe the mayor's key statements in real time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately captures the most important quotes.

tasks.description: At the end, ask one of the prepared questions if given the opportunity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully asks a relevant and concise question.
